[img]https://i.imgur.com/FDJGOjT.png[/img] [b]THIS MOD REQUIRES [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1613533435]WESTERADO[/url] TO WORK![/b] Westerado Wilderness aims to alter biomes to achieve a more western-themed feel to the game, whilst trying to maintain the balance of vanilla Rimworld.
[h1]Features[/h1] Makes alteration to biomes to give the game more of a western theme 10+ New plants; chanterelles, prickly pears, and lavender are a select few of the new plants you'll see 1 New weather; blizzards! Arid biomes have more arid vegetation, adding to the feel of a desolate, hostile, place; debris-like plants and cacti now rule the arid biomes Boreal, Forest, and Swamp biomes have a much higher degree of plant and animal life, including mushrooms Some vanilla plants now have flowering versions of them Compatibility and minor fixes with/to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1322101066]Snowy Trees by Nandonalt and Tejko[/url] Arid and Cold biomes are now more hostile to settlement!
We're also planning on releasing future content updates!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/1pcYJRI.png[/img] Got any questions? Ask them in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1613533435/1744482417434703082/]aptly named Suggestions Thread[/url] and we'll answer them when we can. Got any suggestions? Feel free to post them in the comments, and we'll respond as to the suggestion's feasibility when we can.
[h1]Add-ons and Recommended Mods[/h1] We suggest using all the add-ons, but [b]none[/b] of them are [i]required[/i]. [list] [*]Add-on: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1233906319]Horses by SpiderCamp[/url], adds horses! [*]Add-on: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1634367989]Westerado Gunslinger[/url], adds compatibility with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1631756268]Combat Extended[/url] [*]Add-on: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1617051027]Westerado The Gun Jesus Revelations[/url], renames guns to their 'proper' label [*]Recommended: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1322101066]Snowy Trees by Nandonalt and Tejko[/url], plants get snowy when it snows [/list]
[h1]Mod loading order[/h1] Westerado Wilderness should be loaded after Westerado (Core), if you're using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1322101066]Snowy Trees by Nandonalt and Tejko[/url] put that before Westerado (Core). Something like: [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1322101066]Snowy Trees by Nandonalt and Tejko[/url] [*]Westerado [*]Westerado Wilderness [*]Westerado Gunslinger [*]Westerado The Gun Jesus Revelations [/list]
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] Should be compatible with anything that Westerado (Core) is compatible with. Things that could cause problems: [list] [*]Mods that radically change vanilla biomes [/list]
Have you found a compatibility issue? Please inform us in the comments and we'll try to patch it when we can! Make sure to include a list of mods you've used and any potential error messages.
